target_name: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
indicator_definition: The number of maternal deaths during a given time period per 100,000 live births.
computation_calculations: Compiling data from death reports filed with city, district, and municipal offices, baby and fetal death reports from crematories, and data from the Complementary Survey on Causes of Death of medical institutions.
un_custodian_agency:
MMEIG(Maternal Mortality Estimation Interagency Group)
* WHO, UNICEF, UNFPA, World Bank Group, and UNPD
title: Untitled
